languages.text: {n}Идира презрительно хрюкает и азартно потирает руки.{/n} "Будущее, говоришь, читает? Это мы еще посмотрим кто кого — не с тем псайкером связалась! Мои шепотки сквознячковые хоть и мутные, но никогда осечки не давали. Я и без дружков своих потусторонних тебе скажу, что в будущем у нее ничего хорошего не предвидится, раз Лорд-капитан за дело взял{mf|ся|ась}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира презрительно хрюкает и азартно потирает руки.{/n} "Будущее, говоришь, читает? Это мы еще посмотрим кто кого — не с тем псайкером связалась! Мои шепотки сквознячковые хоть и мутные, но никогда осечки не давали. Я и без дружков своих потусторонних тебе скажу, что в будущем у нее ничего хорошего не предвидится, раз Лорд-капитан за дело взял{mf|ся|ась}".

languages.text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира презрительно хрюкает и азартно потирает руки.{/n} "Будущее, говоришь, читает? Это мы еще посмотрим кто кого — не с тем псайкером связалась! Мои шепотки сквознячковые хоть и мутные, но никогда осечки не давали. Я и без дружков своих потусторонних тебе скажу, что в будущем у нее ничего хорошего не предвидится, раз Лорд-капитан за дело взял{mf|ся|ась}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She sees into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've never failed me once. I can tell you without asking my friends from the other side: HER future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

I can tell you without asking my friends from the other side: HER future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

{n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

languages.text: {n}Idira schnaubt und reibt sich begeistert die Hände.{/n} "Sie kann also in die Zukunft sehen, ja? Da bin ich ja mal gespannt — sie hat sich mit der falschen Psionikerin angelegt! Mein Geflüster mag vage sein, aber es hat mich noch nie enttäuscht. Auch ohne meine ätherischen Freunde zu befragen, kann ich Euch eines sagen: Ihre Zukunft sieht nicht sonderlich rosig aus, wo nun der Lord Captain involviert ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schnaubt und reibt sich begeistert die Hände.{/n} "Sie kann also in die Zukunft sehen, ja? Da bin ich ja mal gespannt — sie hat sich mit der falschen Psionikerin angelegt! Mein Geflüster mag vage sein, aber es hat mich noch nie enttäuscht. Auch ohne meine ätherischen Freunde zu befragen, kann ich Euch eines sagen: Ihre Zukunft sieht nicht sonderlich rosig aus, wo nun der Lord Captain involviert ist."

languages.text: {n}Idira laisse échapper un ricanement de mépris et se frotte les mains.{/n} « Alors comme ça, elle peut prédire l'avenir, ? On verra ça... Elle va devoir se frotter à son psyre cauchemar, ha ha ! Mes murmures sont peut-être vagues, mais ils ne m'ont jamais déçue. Maintenant que {mf|le seigneur|la seigneure}-capitaine s'en mêle, je lui prédis un avenir peu brillant... et pas besoin de consulter mes amis des Éthérés pour ça. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira laisse échapper un ricanement de mépris et se frotte les mains.{/n} « Alors comme ça, elle peut prédire l'avenir, ? On verra ça... Elle va devoir se frotter à son psyre cauchemar, ha ha ! Mes murmures sont peut-être vagues, mais ils ne m'ont jamais déçue. Maintenant que {mf|le seigneur|la seigneure}-capitaine s'en mêle, je lui prédis un avenir peu brillant... et pas besoin de consulter mes amis des Éthérés pour ça. »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声，兴奋地搓起了手。{/n}“她能预见未来，对吧？走着瞧吧！她这次惹上了不该惹的灵能者！我那些耳语的小朋友，或许他们说话有些含混不清，但它们一次都没让我失望过。当然，就算不去问我那些虚无缥缈的朋友，我也可以清楚地告诉你，既然她惹上了舰长大人，那她的前景恐怕不太妙了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声，兴奋地搓起了手。{/n}“她能预见未来，对吧？走着瞧吧！她这次惹上了不该惹的灵能者！我那些耳语的小朋友，或许他们说话有些含混不清，但它们一次都没让我失望过。当然，就算不去问我那些虚无缥缈的朋友，我也可以清楚地告诉你，既然她惹上了舰长大人，那她的前景恐怕不太妙了。”

languages.text: {n}イディラは興奮しながら両手をすり合わせてせせら笑う。{/n}「未来が見えるですって？調べましょうか…彼女も悪い異能者を敵に回したものね！私のそよ風のようなささやきは、あいまいかもしれないけど、一度たりとも外したことはないわ。導師の友人に聞くまでもなく、オーロラの未来はそんなに明るくなさそうよ。ロード・キャプテンが出てきたんだもの」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは興奮しながら両手をすり合わせてせせら笑う。{/n}「未来が見えるですって？調べましょうか…彼女も悪い異能者を敵に回したものね！私のそよ風のようなささやきは、あいまいかもしれないけど、一度たりとも外したことはないわ。導師の友人に聞くまでもなく、オーロラの未来はそんなに明るくなさそうよ。ロード・キャプテンが出てきたんだもの」

languages.text: {n}Idira se burla y se frota las manos emocionada.{/n} «Puede ver el futuro, ¿verdad? Ya lo veremos, ¡se enfrenta a la psíquica equivocada! Mis susurros pueden ser ambiguos, pero no me han fallado ni una vez. Puedo decir sin preguntar a mis amigos etéreos que su futuro no parece muy brillante ahora que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán está en el ajo».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se burla y se frota las manos emocionada.{/n} «Puede ver el futuro, ¿verdad? Ya lo veremos, ¡se enfrenta a la psíquica equivocada! Mis susurros pueden ser ambiguos, pero no me han fallado ni una vez. Puedo decir sin preguntar a mis amigos etéreos que su futuro no parece muy brillante ahora que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán está en el ajo».

languages.text: {n}İdira, heyecandan ellerini ovuşturarak dalga geçiyor.{/n} "Geleceği mi görüyormuş? Göreceğiz bakalım, yanlış ruhsezeri karşısına aldı! Gelgitli fısıltılarım muğlak olabilir ama beni bir kez bile hayal kırıklığına uğratmadılar. İşin başında Lord Kaptan olduğu için eteri dostlarıma sormadan bile Aurora'nın geleceğinin pek parlak görünmediğini söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira scoffs and rubs her hands together in excitement.{/n} "She can see into the future, is that right? We'll see about that — she's up against the wrong psyker! My breezy whispers may be vague, but they've not failed me once. I can tell you without asking my ethereal friends that her future doesn't look too bright now that the Lord Captain is involved."
